page.title: 09CRAMOND :Royal High School
page.content: This school is a comprehensive, co-educational,non-denominational Lothian Regional Council school. It claims to be one of the oldest schools in Britain. Staffing:There is a Rector, 2 deputes,3principal teachers and about 90 teachers. Pupils:1300 on the role Accomodation:23 subject classrooms,9 science labs,10 special subject rooms, suites of rooms for Home Economics,Business Studies and P E,a library,drama studio and welfare room. Timetable: There are 10 teaching periods between 0900-1530. Curriculum:During the first two years pupils follow a common course; in the later years they choose one subject from each of the curricular areas.
